amendment.description: To require a report on barriers to obtaining and paying for adequate medical care for survivors of childhood cancer.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3751 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3751 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Reed to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5902; text: CR S5902) To require a report on barriers to obtaining and paying for adequate medical care for survivors of childhood cancer.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3751 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Reed to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3751 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
